Job Python DeveloperProject Location Hybrid in Charlotte, NCDuration 12+ months Job Summary: ResponsibilitiesWe are looking for a developer, passionate about technology and adopting modern software engineering practices to join us in building next generation quantitative research platforms in the cloud.
